Subject: Science
QuestionText: Match the following terms with their definitions. {matching1.png}
Description: Match each term in the left column with its correct definition from the right column
rightItems: Basic unit of life,Process of making food,Powerhouse of cell

Subject: Maths
QuestionText: Match the mathematical operations with their symbols. {matching2.jpg}
Description: Match each operation with its correct symbol

Subject: English
QuestionText: Match the words with their synonyms. {matching3.png}
Description: Match each word with its correct synonym

Subject: History
QuestionText: Match the historical events with their dates. {matching4.png}
Description: Match each event with its correct year
leftItems: World War I,World War II,American Revolution,French Revolution

Subject: - leftItems: Comma-separated list of items for the left column
- rightItems: Comma-separated list of items for the right column
- correctPairs: Format is "leftIndex-rightIndex" for each pair
- Left item 0 (first item) matches Right item 2 (third item)
- Left item 1 (second item) matches Right item 0 (first item)
- Left item 2 (third item) matches Right item 3 (fourth item)
- Left item 3 (fourth item) matches Right item 1 (second item)
- Both columns must have the same number of items
- Each item in leftItems must have a unique match in rightItems
- The correctPairs should show shuffled/random matches
